metadata.title: CVE-2022-0318 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Heap-based Buffer Overflow in vim/vim prior to 8.2.

notes.note: ccdm94> the patch for CVE-2022-0318 causes one of the utf8 tests to start failing, which in turn causes build failures as well. Commit fc6ccebea66 addresses this issue and updates the test.

criterions.comment: vim package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
